# farFieldCapture

**Instance Property**

Describes whether this port supports far-field input capture.

## Declaration

```swift
var farFieldCapture: AVAudioSessionCapability { get }
```

## Inspecting the port extension

- **highQualityRecording**: Describes whether this port supports Bluetooth high-quality recording.
